last_episode_to_air.name: All is well
last_episode_to_air.overview: In order to save Mukesh, Swapna strikes a deal with Baby. While that's going on, Ram, Meera and Janaki set in motion a plan to rescue their friends

name: Triples
overview: Three friends set out to Goa to deal with a major problem that threatens to ruin their business, and lives. A loan shark, a politician who is on the lookout for his daughter, an ex-wife and a current girlfriend make their journey adventurous.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Three friends set out to Goa to deal with a major problem that threatens to ruin their business, and lives. A loan shark, a politician who is on the lookout for his daughter, an ex-wife and a current girlfriend make their journey adventurous.

episodes.name: The wedding guest
episodes.overview: After hearing Meera's news, Maadhu, Cheenu and Janaki try everything to stop the wedding. Finally, Janaki gets a brainwave.

episodes.name: Ex factor
episodes.overview: Meera, a blast from Ram's very recent past, makes a comeback with news to share. When Maadhu and Cheenu doubt her intentions, she reveals why they divorced.

episodes.name: The wedding crashers
episodes.overview: After hearing Meera's news, Maadhu, Cheenu and Janaki try everything to stop the wedding. Finally, Janaki gets a brainwave.

episodes.name: Gone in 60 seconds
episodes.overview: Ram is all set to do the unthinkable, giving Maadhu and Cheenu quite a scare. Meanwhile, Swapna and Mukesh elope along with something that doesn't belong to them.

episodes.name: Mad Max Mylapore
episodes.overview: Swapna's angry politician father and Baby Chetta's henchmen chase the trio all over Mylapore. Once they are able to take a breather, the three stumble upon a lead.

episodes.name: Go. Goa. Gone
episodes.overview: The Triples land in Goa, and the thieving lovebirds are right there but so is Baby Chetta. To top it all, they have to deal with unwanted guests.

episodes.name: Hide and Seek
episodes.overview: The situation worsens as Chelladurai also finds the hotel and a drunk Cheenu gets loose-lipped with Mythili. If that wasn't enough, Ram gets an ominous phone call.

episodes.name: All is well
episodes.overview: In order to save Mukesh, Swapna strikes a deal with Baby. While that's going on, Ram, Meera and Janaki set in motion a plan to rescue their friends
